profile.name: Alex Johnson
profile.bio: Passionate web developer with a keen eye for design and a love for creating seamless user experiences. I specialize in building responsive, accessible, and performant web applications.

careerGoals.title: Career Goals
careerGoals.description: I'm focused on mastering modern web technologies and growing into a senior frontend role. I aim to contribute to open source projects, mentor junior developers, and eventually lead development teams building products that make a positive impact.
goals: Become a senior frontend developer within the next 2 years
Master React ecosystem and related technologies
Contribute to major open source projects
Speak at tech conferences and share knowledge

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I've developed expertise in various frontend technologies, with a focus on creating responsive and accessible web applications.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each one has helped me grow as a developer.

items.title: E-commerce Platform
items.description: A full-featured online shopping platform with product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout functionality.

items.title: Task Management App
items.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality and team collaboration features.

items.title: Weather Dashboard
items.description: A responsive weather application that provides real-time weather data and forecasts for cities worldwide.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out if you'd like to collaborate, have questions, or just want to say hi!
